links.title: The Website Obesity Crisis
links.description:
Let me start by saying that beautiful websites come in all sizes and page weights.  I love big websites packed with images. I love high-resolution video. I love sprawling Javascript experiments or well-designed web apps. 
    
    This talk isn't about any of those. It's about mostly-text sites that, for unfathomable reasons, are growing bigger  with every passing year.
    
    While I'll be using examples to keep the talk from getting too abstr...

links.title: OMNIZART: MUSIC TRANSCRIPTION MADE EASY
links.description:
Omnizart is a Python library and a streamlined solution for automatic music transcription.
This library gathers the research outcomes from Music and Cultural Technology Lab,
analyzing polyphonic music and transcribes
musical notes of instruments [WCS20],
chord progression [CS19],
drum events [WWS20],
frame-level vocal melody [LS18],
note-level vocal melody [HS20], and
beat [CS20].

links.title: Log4j – Apache Log4j Security Vulnerabilities
links.description: This page lists all the security vulnerabilities fixed in released versions of Apache Log4j 2. Each vulnerability is given a security impact rating by the Apache Logging security team. please note that this rating may vary from platform to platform. We also list the versions of Apache Log4j the flaw is known to affect, and where a flaw has not been verified list the version with a question mark.
links.original_title: Third High Severity CVE in Log4j Is Published
